name: happycat
text: I guess you can pretty much peel out on anything if you put your mind to it.

name: dismas
text:
I read this as "I guess you can pretty much pee on anything if you put your mind to it."

Which is true, I guess, but if you pee on the Pope or something, you'll probably regret it.

name: waldo913
text: I wouldn't regret peeing on the pope.

name: jhunter
text: all furiously sat perched on his fancy hat, clutchin' a bottle

name: dtuba
text:
all peed in his hat
No?

name: bemyfamily
text:
I read both of these comments as two cats talking to each other.

I need friends.

name: mattylite
text: Even Todd.  By teenagers.  Later on.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Todd is a peelout writing artist.

name: abe
text: I have spent minutes trying to figure out how to do that.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: literal minutes.

name: anomalous3
text: It's kind of funny, given that todd is illiterate

name: nexus
text: Haha, well done

name: cicadalek
text:
Hell, he probably didn't even do it on purpose. He thought he was just leaving some nasty marks.

Maybe he just can't read cursive, like Lyle.

name: thatskotkid
text: Or maybe suckin' dick really did buy that van.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: he never been off his knees in so long!

name: gouldgonewild
text: Look, Lyle can read cursive. That was Liebot doing what he does best.

name: aljazeera
text: Even better that he did it in cursive.

name: 2kings
text: bitchin'!

name: a_dude
text: hahaha... classic todd.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: Teodor just can't be mad at Todd, writing his name on the coffee table with his van was just too impressive

name: max
text: Someday, me too... someday...

name: closefriend
text: It lacks the scrawled-out flair of "I dig boners," but respectable nonetheless.

name: greymantledwolf
text: dude's got style.

name: afronaut
text: Well shit, thinks teodor

name: godfatherofsouls
text: TODD

name: katsura
text: Was Todd an extra in Peel-Out Summer ?

name: i_love_kate
text: Teodor's appreciative expression in the last panel makes this one for me.

name: drskradley
text: That's quite impressive, actually.

name: em2
text: ...is what he thought.

name: kamet
text: I don't know how you could NOT give this a five...

name: daidai
text: I can do that.

name: daidai
text: It was a 4.

name: rbisme
text: sukkin dik made that possible

name: mc_white
text: Only dicks spell their own name in a peel out, if you don't have a cause you should be wrapped in gauze as the saying goes

name: hamscout
text:
your honna, todd's van clearly did not make those mahks on the cohffee taybull--His van was only available with the teardrop window option in 1982, and that model did not have a split rear transaxle...
[IMGS OFF]

name: farqussus
text: That's nothing. I've done that. I wrote COOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

name: zem
text: are you a bird

name: farqussus
text: what of it? if a squirrel can drive a van on a coffee table and/or waterski, who's to say what a bird can or cannot do

name: cjsalt
text: THESE KNIVES

name: stereo
text: Even if he's literate, it appears he wrote it in reverse, which is quite impressive.

name: private_public
text: This is the perfect strip. Setting up Todd for a lifetime of being a dick.

name: berami
text: I love Teodor's "well, I'll be damned," look.  He can't be mad at something that impressive.

name: gournal
text: You pooped in the refrigerator?  And you ate the whole... wheel of cheese?  How'd you do that?  Actually I'm not even mad- that's amazing.

name: epicurus
text: Ironically Todd's Peel-Out handwriting seems substantially neater and more legible than his Regular handwriting.
